title: Sony set to launch new Xperia phones on May 11
content:
Sony’s relaunched and reinvigorated Xperia line is set to gain new phones very soon as the Japanese firm has confirmed a May 11 launch event for new hardware.

more…

The post Sony set to launch new Xperia phones on May 11 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sony's Xperia line is set to gain new phones very soon as the Japanese firm has confirmed a May 11 launch event for new hardware.
